documents.title: An App About Apps
documents.overviewSubtitle: A one stop shop to get started building your own apps
documents.detailSubtitle: Get started building your own apps
documents.description: Download the app for the educational project, where you can access all materials, descriptions, activities, portfolios, and documents.

documents.title: 1. Navigation bar
documents.overviewSubtitle: A one stop shop to get started building your own apps
documents.detailSubtitle: Learn how to make a navigation bar
documents.description: In this Swift app, you will learn through tasks, code, and explanations how to create your own Navigation Bar (Menu) in your app. You will learn to build different numbers of buttons, pages, and media content in your app.

documents.title: 2. Stacks
documents.overviewSubtitle: A one stop shop to get started building your own apps
documents.description: In the Stacks app, you will learn how to place different types of objects in VStacks, HStacks, and ZStacks. With this app, you'll learn how to control the layout of your app, making it easier to design the desired layout.

documents.title: 3. Content
documents.overviewSubtitle: A one stop shop to get started building your own apps
documents.detailSubtitle: Learn how to add content to your app
documents.description: With this resource, you will gain the skills to insert your own photos, videos, and links into your app to make it more visual and appealing.

documents.title: 4. Things to get you started
documents.overviewSubtitle: A one stop shop to get started building your own apps
documents.detailSubtitle: A few ideas to get you started quickly
documents.description: With this app, you'll learn some of the cool things you can do when creating apps, such as making different types of buttons, slider buttons, GPS maps, and much more.
